name: Before the Fall
description:
Save the world from impending disaster. You are all that stands in the way of earth and the next Armageddon, It's time to suit up, grapple asteroids, and blow stuff up.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Look around

Z - Zoom

Q - Fire Grapple Hook

B - Drop Bomb

Late Edit
This version just barely missed the upload window, so it's not eligible for the jam. But we worked hard to finish it and if you liked the official entry below, and want to see it more fleshed out, you can find it here. 

https://www.dropbox.com/s/cg1uvmt3mbsl1w8/DominantLobsters_BeforeTheFall.zip?dl=0

Note: Controls for late version have changed. Grapple and Bomb switched to Left and Right mouse clicks respectively:
